reason: The market is clearly in a Markdown phase, evidenced by Bitcoin tumbling near last week's lows and other crypto prices plunging. Negative sentiment is exacerbated by Coinbase missing Q4 estimates and broader 'AI fears' impacting the tech sector and precious metals, suggesting contagion. While regulatory involvement (CFTC appointments, Crypto PAC activity) could provide long-term clarity, in the short term, it introduces political uncertainty and volatility during a period of price weakness.
headlines: Crypto execs Armstrong, Garlinghouse among many named to U.S. CFTC advisory group
Coinbase misses Q4 estimates as transaction revenue falls below $1 billion
Bitcoin tumbles back near last week's lows as AI fears crush tech and precious metals plunge
Crypto PAC Fairshake seeks to force resistant Texas Democrat Al Green from U.S. House
Sharplink's Lubin and Chalom make their case for ether DATs as prices plunge
